channel.title: Need lotd of help!
channel.description:
NEED HELP WITH EVERYTHING
im new and have no idea on how too work moparscape or hamatchi(i got both) :confused:

item.title: Need lotd of help!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

To join a server go to the server advertisement section and look for a server that you want to join and find out fi it has hamachi or no-ip.If it has a no ip it will look like this , name.no-ip.If that server use’s no-ip then you won’t need hamachi.If the server is using hamachi they will give you a network name and pass for you to join using the program hamachi.Which you can download at www.hamachi.cc.If you want to host a server with hamachi just download it and click create a new network , and then put a user name a pass for the network and tell people that name and pass and they join your network.Then they use the ip beside your name on hamachi to join your server using moparscape client.Look for tut’s int he tut section and go to the download section to download a source.If you need any help let me know…

Read full topic

item.title: Need lotd of help!

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

To make a server you must download a source in the downloads section and change the stuff Mod Taharok tells you to in his Ultimate Server Guide in the tutorial section.
